name: Cataract Kush
description:
This is the combination of LA Confidential and OG Kush. This strain was created by DNA Genetics and it has blankets of crystals and looks almost grayish-black.

The effect is good for pain, eating and sleep disorders. Most describe Cataract as a "creeper" high that keeps on building long after you stop smoking! This strain has been years in the making and is NOT recommended for the light-weight smoker. After you experience the Cataract Kush you'll think you have cataracts!
descriptionPlain:
This is the combination of LA Confidential and OG Kush. This strain was created by DNA Genetics and it has blankets of crystals and looks almost grayish-black.The effect is good for pain, eating and sleep disorders. Most describe 
Cataract as a "creeper" high that keeps on building long after you stop smoking!  This strain has been years in the making and is NOT recommended for the light-weight smoker. After you experience the Cataract Kush you'll think you have cataracts!

highlightedReviews.text: Super dense buds, often with some purple/grey/blue coloration, thick stems and opaque, white trichomes. Smell is classic indica - earthy and dank with an animalic note, yet there's a strong sweet/minty/spicy aspect that seems to really carry. The vapor from this one is thick, sweet and permeating. Overall, very pleasant aroma though problematic if you're trying to keep the smell down. The buzz is fairly long-lasting and mostly body. I find it works really well for back/leg pain as well as insomnia. No unusual or severe side effects, making it very desirable for those who want to avoid anxiety-inducing, intense mental highs. As might be expected, it makes one lazy, sleepy and hungry.

Definitely hard to see through the squint after puffing this awesome smoke. I thought it was a good high until it crept up a bit more into a great high. Relaxing - giggly and creative - a worthwhile trip to the store for this weed - itâ€™s blinding ðŸ˜Ž
